A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is absolutely terrible. The story is clunky\, soooooo many cheesy jokes\, the dialog has too many stupid lines\, there are a lot of unnecessary scenes.

The characters are not developed\, the main villain is useless\, certain characters should have died\, others should have continued on. 

There is little  explanation as to why Luke is in hiding\, why he won't train her\, and why he decides to help again.

This movie is going to receive rave reviews from non true star wars fans\, however all who are true fans should be pissed that the director will be given his own trilogy!
